segments.text: Can anyone tell me where I can buy the ingredients to make Chinese food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a supermarket in Kensington High Street . I'll come and give you a hand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here , take one of these trolleys . What do you want exactly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm after things to stuff dumplings with , like Chinese cabbage
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The fruit and vegetables are over there .
segments.speaker: S2
